title: Presenting data the Significance way - Part 1
content:
Abstract
Want to be published in Significance? Our data visualisation guide, created by Andreas Krause and Nicola Rennie, offers contributors insights, advice, and examples (with code) to make data outputs more readable, accessible, and impactful. Over the next few issues, we will publish it section by section until you have a complete guide to creating the best data visualisation for the needs of both your article and Significance magazine
